text_block_list.text: Today is the "Selection Race". An important day for upcoming horsegirls to display their blossoming running abilities to the trainers present.
I, as well, was eager to discover the potential of the future horsegirls here and scout for one to take under my wing. Just then…

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Color me surprised. Did you see the updated start list they just handed out? I wondered what was up, and it turns out Agnes Tachyon's been added to it…!

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: What? Agnes Tachyon!? That… talented girl, who — rumour has it — is quite the hazardous presence!?
I remembered what had a happened in the infirmary a few days earlier, and a chill ran down the length of my spine. But—

text_block_list.name: Selection Race Official
text_block_list.text: Ms. Tachyon, Ms. Agnes Tachyon!? That's strange… Ms. Cafe, have you seen Ms. Tachyon!?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Ehh… d-don't ask me…

text_block_list.name: Selection Race Official
text_block_list.text: Huuuh… what are we supposed to do now…

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Aww. Sounds like Tachyon's not going to show up today either. I was hoping to see her fabled "superluminal " final spurt.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: But why? Her mother won Oka Sho, her grandmother won Oaks… Even among her prestigious lineage she was praised as their "magnum opus" before enrolling here.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: If only she wasn't so… unusual.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Pardon me, Manhattan Cafe. Is Agnes Tachyon… not coming?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: It's my understanding that the academy has informed her that participation in this Selection Race is mandatory.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Ah, yes… The notification did reach her, and I know she requested details… But, well…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: But she chose not to race anyway…? Understood, thank you.
I could see that Symboli Rudolph was deeply concerned. What would happen to Agnes Tachyon if she missed this race…?
choice_data_list: (… Let me go look for her)

text_block_list.text: I decided to leave the track for a bit and search for Agnes Tachyon.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Haa…? What the hell are you doing here, Tachyon?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: What an uncharacteristically illogical question, my dear Shakur. As a student of the academy, is it somehow unusual for me to be seen here on the academy grounds?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: No, dang it! Ain't you supposed to be in the Selection Race today!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Ha ha ha! There's no need for that attitude! Are you running a little low in serotonin?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: The answer is simple. I judged it unnecessary. I have my objectives and, unfortunately, competing in the race does not serve them.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: And good lord, did you see what happened last time I did one of those things? Trainers swarming all over me like guinea pigs on freshly-thrown cabbage…

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: … Ain't that 'cause they were so impressed with your running?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I know, but… the training schedules those people come up with… so inefficient! I can't just be throwing away precious research time.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: They get to apply their standards, pick and choose the horsegirls they like… don't we have a right to choose as well?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Ugh! Alright, whatever!! I don't wanna hear, I don't care. Skip all the races you want.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: …But y'know, research this, experiment that. If you keep missing classes, refuse to race, refuse to get a trainer, never make your debut…

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: … they're not gonna to let you keep hanging around here.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hmm. She said "I don't care" and to do whatever I want but she still wants to give me advice… Oh, my dear Shakur, you do amuse me.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: And, oh…? You… Well, if it isn't the junior trainer from the other day!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Have you come back voluntarily, to offer up your body in the name of science? Truly, the soul of a guinea pig! Quite, quite extraordinary!
I desperately managed to calm her down and explained I was there to try and persuade her to participate in the Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Oh, is that all. Sorry to disappoint you, but I have no intention of participating.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: That race is a place for horsegirls to show off their potential, just as much as a place for trainers to find new prospects.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: And at this moment in time, I have no need to prove my capabilities to anyone at present. Therefore, I will not participate. That is all I will say on the matter.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: —Now then, let us instead continue with our experiment!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I just so happen to have put the finishing touches to a neuromuscular monitor of my own invention just last night. A thousand times greater resolution than conventional equipment—
choice_data_list: You're really all about the experiments, huh!?
You really only care about your experiments, don't you!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: The limits of what is possible can only by probed through rigorous experimentation. It takes time, and the more time the better. Am I wrong?
choice_data_list: What researching could be that important…?
What research could be so important…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: "The potential of horsegirls".

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: More accurately, "the physiological potential that lies dormant within the organism known as the horsegirl". In essence,"the absolute limits of speed"— no, what lies "beyond the limits".

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: There is so-called conventional wisdom on this topic of course. But what is conventional wisdom if not the enemy of discovery?! We must reexamine—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Why, even the very nature of horsegirls is itself a profound question, my dear trainer.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: While this body may be superficially similar to a human's, our ears and tails are highly developed, and it possesses extraordinary strength for its mass.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: In particular, our running ability is outstanding even in the animal kingdom, possessing speed superior to most species.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: —Ahahaha!! Truly… TRULY fascinating, do you not agree?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: In short, my dear, my guiding motivation is a simple one. "How fast can we go?", "How vast is our potential?"

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I, with this body, aim to find the outer limits of our potential! The outer limits of speed!
choice_data_list: That's what your research was for…!?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: It's fair to say the the horsegirls who are able to push their performance the furthest are those who pursue high-level competition.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: The higher the level, the stronger the competition, and that is indispensible to extracting peak performance.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: So, of course, getting to race in the Twinkle Series would be a boon to my research. Hence why I came to this academy in the first place.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: But, well—

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text: Agnes Tachyon. …Academy management wants to see you. Come.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hmmm, it seems I have been summoned. …Well then, I'll have to excuse myself, rookie.
The teacher, a grave expression on his face, led Agnes Tachyon away…
